commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
"use client"; import React from "react"; import Container from "../Container"; import Image from "next/image"; import { FaArrowRightLong } from "react-icons/fa6"; const WhatWeDo = () => { return (

What We Do

{/*

What We Do

*/}

We're creative, data driven agency focus on connecting brands and consumers through unforgettable experiences.

ATL Media

Pre and post planning and buying TV,Radio,OOH, Cinema. PR event set-up, press invite, PR tracking.

Digital Media

Google Ad, local website partnerships, social media page management, community management.

KOL/Influencer Management

Mega,Macro,Nano talents for endorsement or.

Below The Line

Events, concerts, live boxing, activation, trade shows, international artists scouting.

Production & Design

TVCs & Vudei production, TV content, 2D & 3D animation, Graphic designs, Branding, Social media content,POSMs.

); }; export default WhatWeDo;
